statements: SELECT * FROM security_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_message, device_id FROM security_logs WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT timestamp, device_id FROM security_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%'
SELECT log_id FROM security_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM security_logs ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE log_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4d10'
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM security_logs WHERE device_id = 'device123' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM security_logs ORDER BY device_id
SELECT log_message FROM security_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%'
SELECT * FROM security_logs;
SELECT device_id, log_time FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_analysis WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT log_id, threat_level FROM threat_analysis ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT log_message FROM security_logs WHERE device_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM security_logs WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY log_time ASC
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_time FROM security_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT security_logs.log_id, threat_analysis.threat_level, threat_analysis.threat_description FROM security_logs INNER JOIN threat_analysis ON security_logs.log_id = threat_analysis.log_id
SELECT MAX(log_time) AS latest_log_time, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM security_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 10
SELECT * FROM security_logs;
SELECT device_name, log_timestamp, log_description FROM security_logs;
SELECT device_name, log_description FROM security_logs WHERE device_name = 'Server';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM security_logs GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, log_timestamp, log_description FROM security_logs WHERE device_name = 'Server_A';
SELECT * FROM threat_signatures WHERE signature_id > 1000 ORDER BY signature_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM security_logs GROUP BY device_name HAVING total_logs > 10 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Firewall' AND ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp FROM security_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, location FROM Devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT * FROM ThreatSignatures WHERE severity >= 3;
SELECT analysis_id, signature_id, analysis_result FROM ThreatAnalysis WHERE analyzed_by = 'AI';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM Devices WHERE last_checkin > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY device_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT signature_name, severity, description FROM ThreatSignatures WHERE severity >= 8 ORDER BY severity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_id, signature_id, analysis_result, analyzed_by FROM ThreatAnalysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Malicious' ORDER BY analysis_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents JOIN Devices ON SecurityEvents.device_id = Devices.device_id ORDER BY device_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Malware'
SELECT event_id, event_time, event_description FROM security_events WHERE device_id = 101
SELECT device_id, device_name, installed_date FROM devices ORDER BY installed_date DESC
SELECT * FROM threat_signatures WHERE severity > 7
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_id, event_time, event_type FROM security_events WHERE device_id = 1001 AND event_description LIKE '%suspicious%' ORDER BY event_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT d.device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM devices d JOIN security_events se ON d.device_id = se.device_id GROUP BY d.device_name ORDER BY total_events DESC
SELECT u.full_name, u.email, COUNT(*) AS total_detections FROM users u JOIN detections d ON u.user_id = d.event_id GROUP BY u.full_name, u.email ORDER BY total_detections DESC

SELECT ts.signature_name, ts.severity, se.event_time FROM threat_signatures ts JOIN detections d ON ts.signature_id = d.signature_id JOIN security_events se ON d.event_id = se.event_id ORDER BY se.event_time DESC LIMIT 10
